MOWWL1.Description of CMU Components:
The CMU component is an offshore wind farm which consists of: 

? 40 X SGRE DD 222 X 14.7 MW Wind Turbine Generators (WTG). 
? 40 X monopile foundations (MP). 
? 40 X transition pieces (TP).
? 2x Offshore Substation Platforms (OSP). 
? 2x 220kV approx. 50km Offshore Export Cables.
? 40x 66kV associated inter array cables, organised in eight strings connected to OSP 1 and OSP 2. 
? Metering equipment installed at the OSP 1 and OSP 2.
? Cable landfall and transition joint close to Portsoy. 
? 2x Horizontal Directional Drilled (HDD) ducts below the shoreline. 
? 2x 220kV approx. 25km Onshore Export Cables.
? 1x interconnector cable between the OSPs.
? Connection to the National Grid at Blackhillock Substation.
MOWWL1.Location and Post Code:
Siemens Energy Construction Site Moray West 400kv Substation, Whitehillock Farm, Aberdeenshire, AB55 5PH

Moyle2.Description of CMU Components:
The Moyle Interconnector links the electricity grids of Northern Ireland and Scotland through submarine cables running between converter stations at Ballycronan More in Islandmagee, County Antrim and Auchencrosh in Ayrshire. The link has a capacity of 500 MW.
The Moyle Interconnector is owned and operated by Moyle Interconnector Limited, which is in turn financed through Moyle Holdings Limited and Moyle Interconnector (Financing) plc, all part of the Mutual Energy Limited group of companies.
Moyle2.Location and Post Code: Auchencrosh Converter Station, Ballantrae, Girvan, KA26 OPE

Moyle9.Description of CMU Components: The Moyle Interconnector is a dual monopole Light Triggered Thyristor HVDC interconnector. Each pole operates at 250kV, and can transmit 250MW of power. Both poles operate together to provide seamless power transfer from 500MW import to 500MW export. Moyle is connected to the Scottish Power Transmission network at Auchencrosh converter station; situated at Ballentrae. Auchencrosh is connected via a 275kV overhead line to Coylton substation.

Glenapp Estate
